Module kivakit.core.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.primitive.array.bits.io

Interface BitReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseBitReader, BitInput, VariableReadSizeBitInput
    public interface BitReader
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A bit reader can read a single bit with readBit() or up to 64 bits with readLong(int). The method hasNext() returns true if there is at least one more bit to read and close() closes the source of bits using the method implemented in onClose().
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Method Summary

      default void close()

      Called to close the reader
      default int read​(int bits)  
      boolean readBit()  
      int readFlexibleInt​(int smallBitCount, int bigBitCount)
      Reads the next bit and then reads a value with the given small bit count if the bit is true, otherwise reads the given big bit count.

      default java.lang.String readString()  
      default int size()
